actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to authorize the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to provide additional educational assistance under the Post-9/11 Educational Assistance Program of the Department of Veterans Affairs to certain eligible individuals.
short_title: GI Bill STEM Extension Act of 2014

titles.title: GI Bill STEM Extension Act of 2014

To amend title 38, United States Code, to authorize the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to provide additional educational assistance under the Post-9/11 Educational Assistance Program of the Department of Veterans Affairs to certain eligible individuals.
